snippet: Iranian diplomats interrupted nuclear talks after the United States announced an expanded list of companies and individuals whose trading activities it would try to block for evading sanctions against Iran.
abstract: Iranian diplomats involved in nuclear talks with six world powers in Vienna interrupt discussions when United States announces expanded list of companies and individuals whose trading activities would be blocked for evading sanctions against Iran; Iranians say measures undermine interim deal reached in November.
lead_paragraph: Iranian diplomats interrupted nuclear talks after the United States announced an expanded list of companies and individuals whose trading activities it would try to block for evading sanctions against Iran.
